content:
QueryClientCertificateCallback Delegate

Definition

The QueryClientCertificateCallback delegate gets or sets the default callback function used to specify the client certificates while establishing an SSL connection.

In this Article

public delegate System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate QueryClientCertificateCallback(LdapConnection connection, byte[][] trustedCAs);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
QueryClientCertificateCallback
